item.title: Learning the Nimble Nim
item.description: Table of Contents ¶ What is Nim? Why? The Surprises Variables Switch Cases For Loops Procedures Arrays Objects Conclusion What is Nim? ¶ Nim does a good job explaining what it is in a short way on their website: Nim is a statically typed compiled systems programming language. It combines successful concepts from mature languages like Python, Ada and Modula. But that quote only covers a tiny portion of what Nim really is.
